text: How many tests cover each method in your TDD code base?

As part of my research on projects written using TDD, I would like to build a histogram like:
x% of methods were covered by y% of tests (e.g.
60% of methods covered by 10% of tests, 25% of methods covered by 20% of tests, and 15% of methods covered by 30% of tests).
Generally, when y goes up x is expected to go down.
I hypothesize that TDD encourages y to be relatively high, but I need some data to support this claim.
Can anyone provide such metrics for their TDD project?
